title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Education) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister education) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Áine Doyle, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Áine Doyle, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Education, Marlborough Street, Dublin 1, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Education with effect from 
27 June 2020.
text_norm: 2 aine doyle particular whose address deposited office department education marlborough street dublin 1 appointed special adviser minister education effect 27 june 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Christopher Mannion particulars of whose address have been deposited
text_raw:
3. Christopher Mannion particulars of whose address have been deposited 
at the offices of the Department of Education, Marlborough Street, Dublin 1, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Education with effect from 
29 July 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [705] 3
